content: sleeve repeat round 1 for one inch cast off gently in pattern repeat for other sleeve ~~© cathy rubin 2012 australia~~ page 6 of 7 ties cable chart crochet four single chain lengths 10inches/25cms long chart crochet chain tutorial link is in reference section attach as follows to your cardigan a 1 under right armpit on the outside b 1 under left armpit on the inside c 2 each on the front flaps where the cables start see picture below key symbol description c2b slip 1 stitch to the cable needle and hold at the back knit the next stitch and then knit the stitch from the cable needle c2f slip 1 stitch to the cable needle and hold at the front knit the next stitch and then knit the stitch from the cable needle cable written refer to cable chart key for abbreviations row 1 rs *c2b c2f repeat from * to end of row row 2 ws purl if flat knitting body knit if in the round sleeves row 3 rs *c2b c2f repeat from * to end of row row 4 ws purl if flat knitting body knit if in the round sleeves row 5 rs *c2b c2f repeat from * to end of row you can add finishing touches to your ties for example beads like i have or pom row 6 ws purl if flat knitting body knit if in the round sleeves poms tutorial for pom poms in reference section weave all ends in and gently wet block to shape see reference section on blocking ~~© cathy rubin 2012 australia~~ page 7 of 7 copyright and thank-you reference section the copyright of this pattern remains with the author how to make a crochet chain feel free to knit in a pear tree for your friends and family or charities but don t re- http //www youtube com/watch v=otmoezm_oxq produce this pattern in all or parts for commercial use products made from any or parts of this pattern are also not allowed to be sold how to make easy quick pom poms lifetime cottage licences are available for a small one off fee http //www youtube com/watch v=attdvryefby thank-you very much to my testers without you this pattern would not be possible  knitting cables c2b and c2f without a cable needle http //www youtube com/watch v=dt84v90lc_i make one m1 http //www youtube com/watch v=qcv0vc0yim4 wet blocking http //www youtube com/watch v=ikuyir5pb_k fork flowers as shown on cords of striped version http //www crochetgarden com/crochetblog/ p=74 ~~© cathy rubin 2012 australia~~
